thread.title: Rob K. Honors Late Father on His Birthday: “Wish You Were Here to Meet Dream”
thread.title_full: Rob K. Honors Late Father on His Birthday: “Wish You Were Here to Meet Dream”

author: Zoe Jewell
title: Rob K. Honors Late Father on His Birthday: “Wish You Were Here to Meet Dream”
text:
February 22, 2017 by Zoe Jewell 0 Shares Advertisement 
Rob Kardashian wishes his father was alive to meet his daughter, Dream . 
The Keeping Up With the Kardashians star paid tribute to his late father, who passed away in 2003 following a battle with cancer, with a sweet post on what would’ve been his 73rd birthday. 
"Happy birthday pops,” he captioned a photo with his father. A post shared by ROBERT KARDASHIAN (@robkardashian) on Feb 22, 2017 at 8:28am PST 
"Happy birthday, Dad, Woohoo! Wish you were here to meet Dream,” he said in another post. Feb 22, 2017 at 8:29am PST 
Kourtney Kardashian also posted a sweet tribute to her poppa. 
“Happy birthday to the most handsome, funniest, sweetest, best daddy in the world!” A post shared by Kourtney Kardashian (@kourtneykardash) on Feb 22, 2017 at 12:04pm PST 
Meanwhile, the 29-year-old and Chyna recently broke up again , with sources close to the model claiming she became fed up with the reality star. 
The 28-year-old — who also shares son King Cairo, 4, with ex-boyfriend Tyga — believed the sock designer was unhealthy for their family. A post shared by ROBERT KARDASHIAN (@robkardashian) on Feb 20, 2017 at 8:52am PST 
"They split a while ago. The wedding plans are off. They are both trying to be mature about it. It was less dramatic this time,” a source told People. 
"Chyna is super fed up with Rob and thinks he is way too emotional and depressed. 
“She thinks he has terrible issues. He is always battling his own insecurities and is unstable,” the source continued. A post shared by ROBERT KARDASHIAN (@robkardashian) on Jan 10, 2017 at 3:34pm PST 
“It's a major turn-off to her, and she thinks it's incredibly unhealthy for the baby and their family.” 
The pair got engaged in April 2016 , just four months after they started dating. A post shared by ROBERT KARDASHIAN (@robkardashian) on Dec 31, 2016 at 11:30am PST 
"They're living separately and she's keeping Rob at arm's length, both from the baby and from her." 
Another insider said the couple, who have been living apart since their initial split before Christmas, have been struggling to get along over the past few months. A post shared by ROBERT KARDASHIAN (@robkardashian) on Dec 31, 2016 at 12:03am PST 
"[It's the same] with her yelling and screaming about how his family doesn't like or support her, and his insecurities." 
The drama continues!
